attributes.action: Accept that we as genuine taxpayers will refuse to pay income tax until all fraudulent mp expense claims are returned back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that it is unfair that the taxpayers should be paying high rates of income tax when money is still owed to the treasury.  The MPs who claimed expenses fraudulenty should be brought to justice.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
